original_text: For the enemy hath persecuted my soul; he hath smitten my life down to the ground; he hath made me to dwell in darkness, as those that have been long dead.
korean_text: 원수가 내 영혼을 핍박하며 내 생명을 땅에 엎어서 나로 죽은 지 오랜 자 같이 나를 암흑 속에 두셨나이다

sentences.original_text: For the enemy hath persecuted my soul
he hath smitten my life down to the ground
he hath made me to dwell in darkness
as those that have been long dead
